queryDesc.name: freeRoomSelect
checkIsRoomFree
queryDesc.description: Check whether room is free. It will return room if room is not free

queryDesc.name: SELECT_CLIENT_ORDERS
queryDesc.query: SELECT ORD.ID ID, ORD.START_DATE START_DATE, ORD.FINISH_DATE FINISH_DATE, ORD.COST COST, ORD.STATUS STATUS, HOT.NAME NAME, R.ROOM_NUMBER ROOM_NUMBER FROM ORDERS ORD JOIN HOTELS HOT ON ORD.HOTEL_ID = HOT.ID JOIN ROOMS R ON ORD.ROOM_ID = R.ID WHERE ORD.CLIENT_ID = ${CLIENT_ID}

queryDesc.name: SELECT_ORDERS_IN_HOTEL
queryDesc.description: Get list of orders in hotel
queryDesc.query: SELECT ORD.ID ID, ORD.START_DATE START_DATE, ORD.FINISH_DATE FINISH_DATE, ORD.COST COST, ORD.STATUS STATUS, R.ROOM_NUMBER ROOM_NUMBER, ORD.CLIENT_ID CLIENT_ID, CL.FIRST_NAME FIRST_NAME, CL.SECOND_NAME SECOND_NAME, CL.FATHER_NAME FATHER_NAME, CL.PHONE_NUMBER PHONE_NUMBER FROM ORDERS ORD JOIN ROOMS R ON ORD.ROOM_ID = R.ID JOIN CLIENTS CL ON CL.ID = ORD.CLIENT_ID WHERE ORD.HOTEL_ID = ${HOTEL_ID} AND ${START_DATE} <= START_DATE AND FINISH_DATE <= ${FINISH_DATE}

queryDesc.name: allRoomForManagerSelect
queryDesc.description: Get list of rooms in hotel
queryDesc.query: SELECT R.ID, R.ROOM_NUMBER, R.HOTEL_ID, R.ROOM_TYPE_ID, RT.TYPE_NAME, RT.COST, R.STATUS FROM ROOMS R JOIN ROOM_TYPES RT ON R.ROOM_TYPE_ID = RT.ID WHERE R.HOTEL_ID = ${HOTEL_ID}

queryDesc.name: GetListOfOwnersWithHotelDesc
queryDesc.description: Get list of owners with hotel description
queryDesc.query: SELECT OW.ID, OW.FIRST_NAME, OW.SECOND_NAME, OW.FATHER_NAME, OW.EMAIL, OW.HOTEL_ID, OW.TYPE, HOT.NAME HOTEL_TITLE FROM EMPLOYEES OW JOIN HOTELS HOT ON OW.HOTEL_ID = HOT.ID WHERE OW.TYPE = 'OWNER'
